channel.title: Plagued PVP Development Log
channel.description:
Source: ComboPkerz (Camelot PVP) Goal: My goal for this project is to bring back that oldschool PK feeling, without the new school garbage. I have always had a love for Camelot PVP sources for some reason, so I have decided to pursue myself in that direction. They have a good combat feel, and they are small/ easy to work with. I am incorporating more modern commands to the server so it will be easier to play. Yes it is a spawn server, but a heavily mediated spawn server. [size=36pt][u][b]Completion Log[/b][/u][/size]
3-25-13 - Reformed shop system - Deleted useless commands/ fixed remaining commands - Added command lists upon entering for starters - Added multiple teleport NPCs to different PVP locations due to people getting trapped - Removed quite a few objects at home (Made it more roomy and less cluttered) - Started experimenting with a new client background - Removed player yell due to disconnection - Changed some interfaces, and name displays 3-26-13 - Added a whole new teleportation system for clans with 5 different locations (Bandit Camp, 2 Castle Wars Areas, Deserted Town, and Duel Arena) - Changed up items in the shop to be more organized - Fixed some grammatical errors - Deleted useless immature commands - Changed all PKP shop prices, and added new options to spend your points on.
Media - Temporary Background [img]http://i71.servimg.com/u/f71/16/16/97/89/213.jpg[/img] Default Gameframe/ Interfaces (I like it but criticism is welcomed) [img]http://i71.servimg.com/u/f71/16/16/97/89/112.png[/img] Default and new teleport locations (Adding many more to enhance the experience of all around PVP) [img]http://i71.servimg.com/u/f71/16/16/97/89/310.png[/img] Thanks for keeping up with Plagued PVP!

item.title: Plagued PVP Development Log
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Bump, pulled her out from the bottom of the barrel.

item.title: Plagued PVP Development Log
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Source: ComboPkerz (Camelot PVP)

Goal: My goal for this project is to bring back that oldschool PK feeling, without the new school garbage. I have always had a love for Camelot PVP sources for some reason, so I have decided to pursue myself in that direction. They have a good combat feel, and they are small/ easy to work with. I am incorporating more modern commands to the server so it will be easier to play. Yes it is a spawn server, but a heavily mediated spawn server.

[size=36pt]Completion Log[/size]

3-25-13 - Reformed shop system - Deleted useless commands/ fixed remaining commands - Added command lists upon entering for starters - Added multiple teleport NPCs to different PVP locations due to people getting trapped - Removed quite a few objects at home (Made it more roomy and less cluttered) - Started experimenting with a new client background - Removed player yell due to disconnection - Changed some interfaces, and name displays 3-26-13 - Added a whole new teleportation system for clans with 5 different locations (Bandit Camp, 2 Castle Wars Areas, Deserted Town, and Duel Arena) - Changed up items in the shop to be more organized - Fixed some grammatical errors - Deleted useless immature commands - Changed all PKP shop prices, and added new options to spend your points on.

Media -

Temporary Background

213.jpg764×502

Default Gameframe/ Interfaces (I like it but criticism is welcomed)
112.png763×502

Default and new teleport locations (Adding many more to enhance the experience of all around PVP)

Thanks for keeping up with Plagued PVP!
